title: 04/04/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 04/04/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP looks at North Carolina's run in the tournament. Should we have taken notice earlier? Jalen Rose tells us which current players will be recognized as all-time greats when it's all said and done. And Dan explains why he wouldn't be able to retire right now.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP looks at North Carolina's run in the tournament. Should we have taken notice earlier? Jalen Rose tells us which current players will be recognized as all-time greats when it's all said and done. And Dan explains why he wouldn't be able to retire right now.
